feed.title: Seen/Saw
feed.subtitle: Musician Logan Sorese is terrified of the infinite facelessness of the internet, so in order to face his fear, he's releasing a song weekly (sometimes bi-weekly) during 2018.

entry.title: Second Podcast
entry.content:
This post is in the podcast category so it will be included in your podcast RSS feeds. (You can see the feed subscribe links at the bottom of the page.)

It also includes an audio tag so people visiting the blog can play it directly:
